channel.title: [0000317] Project Boomerang [0000317]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]Project Boomerang[/size][/b][/center] [center][b][size=14pt]It'll probably suck[/size][/b][/center]
[center]So I've decided to make a server. I'm using 317 Hyperion. Here are some important things I should note:[/center] [center]1. I've never tried to make a server 2. I have no Java experience 3. I probably couldn't make a PI work
But I'm going to try anyway. I have no goals really. I'll probably make it a pain in the ass by only making 10% of the doors work, 20% of the correct npcs where they belong, and an exp rate of 4. Those aren't my goals, that's just going to be the result. Like any server, the economy will probably be based around rares, and because it's Hyperion, if it goes anywhere and I decided to release, people won't know how to make it work and it will slowly fall to the bottom of the list. However, on the bright side, there will be no customs. Non of that bullshit. I might even remove Tzhaar (if I can figure out how to remove global objects :D)
So yea, here's how far I got. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/juttlv.png[/img] I'm going to do this alone. Development teams fuck everything up. K that's about it.
Credits to: Graham & Blake for Hyperion Mopar for his client [/center]

[/quote]
There’s a formula to replace door id’s and rotate them based on their face, by the way. =][/quote]

I was gonna mention that earlier. GET OUT OF MY HEAD.

@reyx7 wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Project Boomerang[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]It’ll probably suck[/size][/center]

[center]So I’ve decided to make a server. I’m using 317 Hyperion. Here are some important things I should note:[/center]
[center]1. I’ve never tried to make a server
2. I have no Java experience
3. I probably couldn’t make a PI work

But I’m going to try anyway. I have no goals really. I’ll probably make it a pain in the ass by only making 10% of the doors work, 20% of the correct npcs where they belong, and an exp rate of 4. Those aren’t my goals, that’s just going to be the result. Like any server, the economy will probably be based around rares, and because it’s Hyperion, if it goes anywhere and I decided to release, people won’t know how to make it work and it will slowly fall to the bottom of the list.
However, on the bright side, there will be no customs. Non of that bullshit. I might even remove Tzhaar (if I can figure out how to remove global objects :D)

So yea, here’s how far I got.

juttlv.png764×525

I’m going to do this alone. Development teams fuck everything up.
K that’s about it.
